name: Cheese Full
description:
This was made at the GGJ2021 with the theme Lost and Found. 

A Side Scroller 2D puzzle game where you’re a cheese who has lost its sandwich, or is it the sandwich that's has lost its cheese. Either way you play as piece of cheese that is lost, exploring the the floor of a dining room. Finding lost things and new friends on the way to your precious sandwich.

Credits:

Art - Nicole Winqvist

Code - Teemu Nokkanen

Writing - Petri Piiroinen
